name: Welcome to my personal site!
body:
### Welcome to my personal Github page.
This is my site at Github. Feel free to read and give me a suggestion.

Feel free to visit my [Github profile](https://github.com/alive4ever). Take a minute to look at my project page, fork it, report a bug, and create a merge request. I'll be happy to collaborate.

This site is plain. I love plain pages, because it's lightweight on system resources and serves the purpose right. Bloated pages doesn't make sense to me.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
